commission.description: commission defines the commission the validator received.

QueryValidatorCommissionResponse.title: Query Validator Commission Response
QueryValidatorCommissionResponse.description: QueryValidatorCommissionResponse is the response type for the Query/ValidatorCommission RPC method

cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.title: Dec Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.DecCoin.description: DecCoin defines a token with a denomination and a decimal amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Dec which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.ValidatorAcc.title: Validator Accumulated Commission
cosmos.distribution.v1beta1.ValidatorAcc.description: ValidatorAccumulatedCommission represents accumulated commission for a validator kept as a running counter, can be withdrawn at any time.
